Name: Charles Daiquiri
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Navy rum and triple sec add special interest to this Daiquiri .
History: Origin unknown, and as far as we are aware, the Charles Daiquiri doesn't feature in any well-known cocktail books.
Nutrition: One serving of Charles Daiquiri contains 169 calories
